value.string:
from DateTime import DateTime
 from AccessControl import getSecurityManager
 
 # Search current user ID
 user_id = getSecurityManager().getUser().getId()
 source = None
 person_subordination = None
 for person in context.portal_catalog(reference=user_id, portal_type='Person'):
 source = person.getRelativeUrl()
 person_subordination = person.getSubordination()
 break
 
 follow_up_url = None
 start_date = DateTime()
 stop_date = None
 causality = None
 destination = context.getRelativeUrl()
 
 if direction == 'out':
 source_url = source
 source_section_url = person_subordination
 destination_url = destination
 if context.getPortalType() == 'Person':
 destination_section_url = context.getSubordination()
 else:
 destination_section_url = destination
 elif direction == 'in':
 source_url = destination
 if context.getPortalType() == 'Person':
 source_section_url = context.getRelativeUrl()
 else:
 source_section_url = destination
 destination_url = source
 destination_section_url = person_subordination
 else:
 raise KeyError, 'Direction Specified not handling: %s' % direction
 
 event_kw = {}
 event_kw['portal_type'] = portal_type
 event_kw['title'] = title
 event_kw['resource'] = resource
 event_kw['source'] = source_url
 event_kw['source_section'] = source_section_url
 event_kw['destination'] = destination_url
 event_kw['destination_section'] = destination_section_url
 event_kw['follow_up'] = follow_up_url
 event_kw['start_date'] = start_date
 event_kw['stop_date'] = stop_date
 event_kw['causality'] = causality
 
 # Create event
 module = context.getDefaultModule(portal_type=portal_type)
 event = module.newContent(**event_kw)
 
 message = context.Base_translateString('New event created.')
 
 event.Base_redirect(keep_items={'portal_status_message': message})
